topic.title: What's new in Release 13.4
topic.p: Please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 13.4.

section.title: Grid view direct manipulation
section.p: Focusing on usability around our grid view, we've made a lot of great changes to improve your experience using it as your central work space. With 13.4 you can now do the following with direct manipulation:

bullets.item: Add a new column
Show an existing column
Hide a column
Reorder columns
Edit column name

section.p: Learn more about how to update your columns.

section.title: One click to save a tab
section.p: You can now save or reset a tab view with a single click:
Read more about managing favorites and tabs.

section.title: Preview image on grid view
section.p: Have a mock-up that captures the gist of your story? Now you can see it in the mini card preview on the grid view.

section.title: New project creation page
section.p: When you create a new project, you'll now see updated graphics for our standard templates. Easy visuals can help you decide which template may be best for your team to get started. You can always change whatever template you choose as your team's process evolves.

section.title: Performance Improvements
section.p: We've refactored how we process resource intensive jobs, including daily history charts, email notifications, and objective forecasting charts. With these performance improvements, you should now see these jobs are completed and rendered faster.

section.title: End of life Oracle 10g
section.p: With Mingle 13.4, ThoughtWorks Studios will no longer provide support for Oracle 10g. Please read the full community announcement for details.
